short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helpful reminders for paying Ark Nova on Board Game Arena

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reminds you if someone has played key cards:
- Veternarian
- Qurantaine Lab
- Hyrdologist
- Geologist
- Waza Small Animal Program
- Waza Large Animal Program
- Waza Special Assignment
- Explorer
- Diversity Reseracher

Also works for marine worlds alpha!
